oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Disc Jockey Convention hosted in Nashville, Tennessee at the Hermitage Hotel, 1956
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pictured: Grand Ole Opry entertainer Minnie Pearl with event attendees at the Disc Jockey Convention hosted in Nashville, Tennessee at the Hermitage Hotel in 1956. The group was welcomed by the Grand Ole Opry, the country-music variety show that began on radio station WSM in Nashville circa 1925. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Minnie Pearl; West, Ben, 1911-1974
